item.title: Setting up Kindlefire HDX for Development under Ubuntu 12.04
item.description: I wanted to get a Kindlefire HDX running under Ubuntu 12.04 with adb. First I needed to setup the udev rules: 1. Edit /etc/udev/rules.d/51-android.rules as root, and add the following line (create this file if it does not exist): SUBSYSTEM=="usb", ATTRS{idVendor}=="1949", MODE="0666" 2.
